welcome_message_body: Welcome to Onomichi, Japan! This charming city is known for its picturesque hillside streets, stunning temples, and cozy atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Onomichi has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Common (茶房 こもん)
restaurants.description: Common (茶房 こもん) is a café located in 尾道市.

restaurants.name: Onomichi Roman Coffee (尾道浪漫珈琲 本店)
restaurants.description: Onomichi Roman Coffee (尾道浪漫珈琲 本店) is a café located in 尾道市.
restaurants.address: 十四日元町4-1, 尾道市, 広島県, 722-0034

restaurants.name: Murakami (お好み焼き 村上)
restaurants.description: Murakami (お好み焼き 村上) is a okonomiyaki restaurant located in 尾道市.

restaurants.name: 梟の館
restaurants.description: 梟の館 is a café located in 尾道市.

restaurants.name: パン屋航路
restaurants.description: パン屋航路 is a bakery located in 尾道市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hiroshima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Hiroshima Airport handles flights to and from other cities within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Hiroshima Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
